<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Code to lower <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/r600">R600</a> MachineInstrs to their corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>.

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ac2b1c517d194a6bdd00f66bce97f52c3">AsmPrinter::lowerConstant</a>(CV);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
